description.english: Complete the room of Trials
description.german: Schließe den Raum der Prüfungen ab.

description.japanese: 審判の部屋をクリア

description.english: Defeat Xak'olchir, the Blood Hunter
description.german: Besiege Xak'olchir, den Blutjäger.
description.french: Vaincre Xak'olchir, le chasseur de sang
description.italian: Sconfiggi Xak'olchir, cacciatore di sangue

description.tchinese: 擊敗「鮮血獵手」薩克歐奇爾

description.english: Defeat Litz & Nepac, the Cursed Twins

description.tchinese: 擊敗「受詛咒的雙子星」利茲與涅帕克

description.japanese: 呪われた双子、リッツとネパックを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote Litz e Nepac, os Gêmeos Amaldiçoados

description.english: Defeat K'ax taca, High Lord of the Storm

description.japanese: 嵐の主カズ・タカを倒す

description.english: Get 3 successful Parries in less than 2 seconds

description.english: Make 10 Blood Offerings during a single exploration
